name: filter_lines
author: johnsonfung
description: Filter and manipulate lines based on content, delimiters, and patterns

commands.name: remove_lines_without
commands.description: Remove lines not containing specified text

commands.name: keep_lines_with
commands.description: Keep only lines containing specified text

commands.name: keep_lines_without
commands.description: Keep only lines not containing specified text

commands.name: trim_each_whitespace
commands.description: Remove leading/trailing whitespace from every line

commands.name: remove_each_after
commands.description: Remove content after delimiter on each line

commands.name: remove_each_before
commands.description: Remove content before delimiter on each line

commands.name: keep_between
commands.description: Keep only content between delimiters on each line

commands.name: remove_between
commands.description: Remove content between delimiters on each line

commands.name: dedupe_lines
commands.description: Remove duplicate lines keeping first or last occurrence

commands.name: get_dupes
commands.description: Find and display duplicate lines grouped together
